title: The Vending Machine Encounter
story: Why are you taking so long? Is something wrong? Sorry, my bag of chips got stuck. Vending machines suck, huh? They're the worst, but the food is great. It might come out if someone buys an item from the same column yours is on. Can you be that "someone?" Sure, why not? I could use some chips. Thanks! Hey, what is your name? My name is Charlie. Nice to meet you, Charlie. What is your name? Hater of Vending Machines.
summary: A chance encounter at a vending machine leads to an unexpected connection between two strangers.
image: An image of a person reaching into a vending machine, trying to retrieve a stuck bag of chips.
